sptlrpc_rule_set Struct Reference
[sptlrpc]

A set of rules in memory. More...

#include <lustre_sec.h>

Data Fields

int srs_nslot
int srs_nrule
struct sptlrpc_rule * srs_rules

Detailed Description

A set of rules in memory.

Rules are generated and stored on MGS, and propagated to MDT, OST, and client when needed.
